website_summaries.verdict: Performance, features, and value put this versatile bikini trimmer at the top of our list. It's the best available.
pros: Everything you need in a bikini trimmer: lightweight, waterproof, and effective for all types of hair and skin
Blades are hypo-allergenic for irritation-free grooming
cons: On the more expensive end of the spectrum

website_summaries.verdict: This epilator doubles as a shaver, and while it does have a similar level of pain to waxing, it's more effective than shaving and cheaper than waxing or getting laser treatments.
pros: The amount of time varies person to person, but the "shave" does last longer than shaving, and it gets quicker with practice
cons: It's an AC unit, and it will sometimes create ingrown hairs

customer_reviews.title: doesn't pull hair easy..
customer_reviews.text: I used over the past 20 years lots of models ....I'm not too impressed with this one .... doesn't pull hair easy ... I have to go over and over the same spot .... I wouldn't buy this again . I attached picture with my last two I used ... better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dinu D. Popa

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the razer for my wife and it seemed nice when I got it. Sadly...after only one use, the thin metal under the attachment completely ripped itself into pieces. This is only my wifes second silk epil in years and I am highly disappointed in the product quality of this one. Attached are photos so you all can see.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Still

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Overpriced and ineffective. Doesn't catch the finer hairs during epillation even though cheaper brands I have used have done so perfectly. The 'mouth' of the device is also not wide enough to cover a wide area so it takes twice as long for half the end result. Overall extremely disappointed. A bunch of fancy attachments will not detract from a lousy epillator.
customer_reviews.author: Sassafrass

customer_reviews.title: Beauty is Pain. But it is so soft.
customer_reviews.text: I am obviously relatively fuzzy. Arms, Legs, Armpits, Face. I have used them in three of the locations listed above. Armpits hurt like a mf. So I stopped. Legs and arms have taken time but the arms have shown a considerable difference! As for my legs, they are still coarse (I don’t use it regularly as it is a bit time consuming) but they take forever to grow out! It is a blessing. And inexpensive in the long run. Definitely would buy again. You should too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best epilator on the market due to a tiny little difference!
customer_reviews.text: Best epilator I've tried. I had my last one for over 6 years until it finally lost some of its power so I went for a new one. The little bright light that turns on once you switch the epilator on makes ALL the difference! I didn't even realize how important it is until I tried another brand without one. The light lets you spot tiny little hairs you wouldn't otherwise see. The cord is super long so it doesn't bother me that it's not a chargeable one. I'll probably never go for another brand again. Then again I probably don't have to in a long time if this lasts as long as my last one did :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: This product changed my life. I didnt know there was anything out there like this but it's taken a ton of weight off my shoulders. Because of my genetics and hormonal issues I grow body hair fast and thick. This product will save me so much time and money. My skin is incredibly smooth and totally hairless in seconds! It didnt hurt half as bad as getting my under arm waxed.
customer_reviews.author: Karla V Lee

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: I've been using epilators for ten years. This one is very cheaply made. after about 7 uses, the speed on the high setting slowed way down and it does not pull the hair, unless you pass over it 3 or 4 times at all different angles. The machine head also heats up very hot after 20 minutes of use. Definitely a bad product. Am going to contact Braun to look into warranty, which is for one year. But really, buy a more expensive model, not this one, if you want to get a good device. Braun sells wonderful epilators, you just need to spend more. I will next time.
customer_reviews.author: CA Christian

customer_reviews.title: Smooth like buttah
customer_reviews.text: Never used an epilator before this one and now I’m forever hooked! I wanted something that I could use similar to wax but not a wax!! I came across this, read some reviews and decided, why not?! It does sting a bit at first but that does fade. It’s worth it...I love the way my legs stay smoother and even with hair re-growth I personally do not notice it as much or feel the urge to shave everyday as before!!
customer_reviews.author: BrittanyJeness

customer_reviews.title: Painful and superb
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this device! Yes it hurts, put your big girl panties on and go for it anyway. It gets better with each use. I love how well it works and the smooth skin for a couple weeks. I wish I could purchase a replace head only and cut down on the cost of replacing the entire device every couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Staci

customer_reviews.title: Epilator
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used epilators for years, so I’m used to the discomfort. I chose this one as it is corded. I find the cordless ones tend to loose charge too quickly or don’t have the correct strength. This one is good so far. Easy to clean, use and store. My last corded epilator lasted 10 years. The cordless one I bought before this one lasted 2 years. I’m down to like 25 hairs on each leg, and when they grow back they are fine. I find it’s worth the discomfort, as I only have to do it every other week.
customer_reviews.author: Farchimp

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of strawberry legs!
customer_reviews.text: I have what you call "strawberry legs", I am very light, but have dark spots all over my legs from shaving. This epilator has given me new life! It is a bit painful at first, but you get used to it quickly and the results are amazing. Now I don't showing my legs off.
customer_reviews.author: N. E. Moseley

customer_reviews.title: Yes to this!
customer_reviews.text: I am definitely recommending this because it’s way better than using regular shaver. This thing makes my skin so smooth. I prefer using connection the one that feels like hundreds of tweezers pulling your hairs but then I got use to it. I even use the same firm my armpit. Lol it hurts but Im tough I can manage the pain. But don’t worry you can always the other connection that’s painless especially for the delicate area like the bikini line or the armpit.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Straight forward epilator, love the shave head attachment
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Braun epilator. After maybe 10 years the motor on my first Braun died. Very happy with the Silk Epil 5. I consider myself a hairy Caucasian with reactive skin--If I shave I get razor burn every time. With epilating I looked like a plucked chicken for 24-36 hours but my skin doesn't get chewed up. If I'm good about epilating every 5-7 days then it is far less uncomfortable and less irritating. I am thrilled that his epilator comes with a shaver head, which is excellent for the bikini area, which is way too sensitive for me to epilate, or for when I am short on time or don't want a plucked chicken look.
customer_reviews.author: Dearington

customer_reviews.title: Greater Product for Newbies
customer_reviews.text: I think this is a great product for starters like me. It hurts, no question about it. Some areas more than others, but the more you do it, the more use to the pain you get. I didn’t want to spend too much money just in case it wasn’t for me. The reason I give it a 4 out of 5 is because: 1. I wish the built-in light was better (I used my phone flashlight for better visibility); 2. I also found myself going over areas a couple of times which can irritate your skin depending on how sensitive your skin is.
customer_reviews.author: Thais

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: I have an old epilator that I have been using for years. It was a rather painful experience and I did not look forward to using it but it was better than shaving. I purchased this epilator a few weeks ago. I love the improvement. It has a light on it which helps to see what hair is being removed. It is painless and removes much more hair that the older version I had. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: valerie k

customer_reviews.title: DON'T DO IT.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely disappointed with this product. It caused serious irritation and swelling in my legs. I would not recommend it under any circumstances. It's been 24 hours since I epilated with it and my legs are still sore and warm/hot to the touch... as if I had a sunburn. Horrible experience. Will stick to shaving with razors, which have never caused me so much pain. I suggest you do the same. I would also like to add that epilating my whole legs took so much time!!! And my legs are not even smooth because there are still hairs that it didn't catch. Bumps are starting to show too. Overall, it's a 0/10 for me.
customer_reviews.author: Camila B. Cosme

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Smooth and silky legs for weeks!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used epilators for 35 years. This is an excellent product. I’m very pleased with the smooth and silky results. It’s well designed in my hand and pivots as I drag it over my legs. I live in the tropics and I have bare legs showing nearly every day all year around.
customer_reviews.author: Caeli Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Cause ingrown hair
customer_reviews.text: I have been using epilator since I was 16. I was excited for a new one that would be faster and more effective. But this one causes a lot of ingrown hair. Unfortunate because it is very fast at pulling out the hair and saves a lot of time.
customer_reviews.author: Sandey

customer_reviews.title: Not an epilady
customer_reviews.text: It does not work as an epilady . Does not get the hairs from the root as others . Both heads work as electric shaver . I also did not like that it has no cordless feature . Not my cup of tea but waited too long to return
customer_reviews.author: Ana T.

customer_reviews.title: Better than waxing and a razor!
customer_reviews.text: I just bought one for me as my mother had bought one and i used it and loved it! Hope it isn't defective with my luck! My mom's works just fine so i have no worries it will work. It kinda frightened me at first use but as long as you're use to waxing then this is nothing. Also suggest using some lotion on your legs if they are dry. Cause then you end up itchy from the session.
customer_reviews.author: Lily S. Arellano

customer_reviews.title: ... irritation when shaving my bikini line but I absolutely love this epilator
customer_reviews.text: I struggled for years with ingrown hairs and irritation when shaving my bikini line but I absolutely love this epilator. This is the first time I've had one and I admit the first time can be a little painful but Ive gotten used to it. I love that I now can go so long without having to shave. However although this doesn't leave you completely smooth like a razor, a quick pass with a razor will do the job in a couple seconds. I not only save time in not having to shave as often but I also save money with the fact that I barely use a normal razor anymore.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Ok epilator, great razor
customer_reviews.text: This is my first and only epilator, but honestly I barely use to epilation mode anymore. This product has an attachable electric razor head that is seriously the best electric razor I've ever used. It gives me a close shave without any knicks or bumps. My only criticism is that it is corded only, that restricts me to using it next to an outlet and doesn't give me as much mobility as I would like.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works...Must Plug in...Didn't Hurt
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome and reading is fundamental... pay attention to instructions and pictures because after "charging" for several hours, I looked back over everything and saw that it's a power cord, not a charging cord. It's to be used while plugged in on dry skin only. This is not a wet/dry device. It really got the job done fast with shockingly NO Pain. So different from my 1st and only other epilator over 10 yrs ago that hurt so bad, I threw it out after one semi-use. Skin feels like a baby's bottom. This buy was long overdue.
customer_reviews.author: Sazzy

customer_reviews.title: You need to keep buying the epilator head attachments
customer_reviews.text: Braun epilators are not the cheapest. But the epilator head doesn't last long enough for the price. You need to keep putting more money to buy new epilator head. Wish Braun made a elilator head, which would last much longer. We do clean it regularly. Well, not as expected from company like Braun.
customer_reviews.author: Cool_Sun

customer_reviews.title: Horrible design.
customer_reviews.text: I've used silk-epil for many years. The recent re-design is absolutely inconvenient! Who thought of a stupid light on an epilator? Is this designed for me to remove hair in total darkness? Or is it designed to burn my eyes out as I am trying to focus on hair removal? I have to cover it with my thumb because it actually hurts my eyes. Another thing - who thought of a dial to turn that thing on? You need a switch - to click it on and off, not a dial that you actually have to find, look at, and then use two fingers to turn on or off. VERY disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Leyna

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time ever epilating and this device is awesome!! I have thick dark hair on my legs and underarms and I was surprised with the performance of this device on how it pulled every hair from the follicle. It was super simple to use and I am so happy with the results! My legs and underarms are super smooth and hairless. After your first use, you may experience some redness on the areas you epilated but it’s totally normal and goes away in a few hours. The pain was mild in my opinion but that’s because I’ve gotten Brazilian waxes every four weeks for the past two years so I have a pretty good pain tolerance.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Suon

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe I didn't try this type of hair removal sooner!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this device! I've been waxing for a long time and I can't believe I didn't try this type of hair removal sooner. It's a huge money and time saver! Like a previous reviewer stated it does feel like rubber bands popping you but you get use to it quickly, at least I did. The sensitive bits of the bikini area take a little longer to get use to it but it works and you can go at your own pace. Low and high settings. Powered by plug in only, no rechargeable wireless use. Easy to clean and store. Comes with razor head as well.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Best Purchase I’ve Ever Made
customer_reviews.text: This product is worth the buy. I struggled with getting stumble a day after shaving and it was frustrating. After using this epilator, the hair takes a week to grow even the slightest hair. I’ve even noticed that the hair comes back lighter and not as dark. The only thing I dislike is that the epilator only works when it’s plugged in. Other than that, I highly recommend using it rather than shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Whit J

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with Hair in Epilator Head
customer_reviews.text: The item came in a new, sealed package but in used condition. There was hair inside the epilator head from a previous user. There were also items missing from the package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most painful process of eliminating hair but sooo worth it once you get past the pain. The first 2 times are the worst, it’s less painful after that. After the first time I didn’t have to do it again for 2 weeks! I usually have to shave every 2 days if I want clear skin. The first few times leave red bumps on your skin. Don’t worry, they go away. This product is super good, love the additional trimmers.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Langford

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product for all women
customer_reviews.text: Had this for years. Cuts out the expense of buying razors and removes hair from root so it doesn't grow back for weeks also has a light feature to see better. Needs cleaning from time to time for hair stuck inside to work better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't grab as much hair as i would've liked, not worth the pain.
customer_reviews.text: It does not grab as well as I would've liked. I researched the crap out of these things and with my pits, I have coarse dark hair, it missed a lot. Not worth the pain if you have to keep going over and over each section. I went back to shaving after 2 tries with this. I think people who can do this are very rare! And I even did my pits!
customer_reviews.author: Trinell

customer_reviews.title: The best epilator!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my armpits and will never shave again. The first use hurts terribly... but after that it will change your life. Thinner hair, use less often than shaving, no razor bumps or ingrown hairs, smoother armpits and no darkness. So great my mon even switched from her epilator to this one!
customer_reviews.author: Josie

customer_reviews.title: BEST EVER
customer_reviews.text: IVE BEEN USING AN OLD BRAUN WITH 10 HEADS... IT ONLYGREABS COARSE HAIR... IM SO GLAD I BOUGHT THIS TO REPLACEMY OLD ONE...GETS MY REALLY FINE BLONDE HAIRS & I CAN BARELY FEEL IT AS OPPSED TO THE OLD ONE. BEST PURCHASE EVER
customer_reviews.author: Juliette U

customer_reviews.title: SCORE!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE LOVE LOVE this epilator! I have had two others (different brands) and this one is very effective, easy to clean, and the light makes a world of difference in getting areas that are easy to miss (esp on the legs). It is easy to hold in your hand. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: love2read

customer_reviews.title: Awful! Hurts much more than other epilators!
customer_reviews.text: Awful! Hurts like hell! I have always used the Philips Satinelle, and have always liked it. I don’t know for what reason, I decided to go with a different epilator brand and bought the Braun Silk epic. The worst decision ever! Hurts soooo much more than the Satinelle.
customer_reviews.author: caroline z coelho

customer_reviews.title: It does work but....
customer_reviews.text: Even with multiple passes, I still find that I've missed a lot of hair. If you're a first timer, do not be afraid, it isn't painful. It just feels like you're tweezing. I will keep trying to master the art of epilating and give an updated review.
customer_reviews.author: Jass

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and quick, but I've got lots of ingrowns.
customer_reviews.text: I used another brand for over 10 years, and I liked it a lot. the only bad thing was that it took too long to epilate. Decided to go, after researching for Brawn and it was super easy to use, quick and the light is a huge plus. The downturn was that I had pretty much all hair ingrown after using it for the first time. Never had this problem with the old one I had. I had to scrub my skin every day and let it grow for a month before trying again. Not happy about that. I just tried again and hopefully, I won't have ingrowns this time.
customer_reviews.author: rnad

customer_reviews.title: A one
customer_reviews.text: Braun products are no one. My wife used wax technic earlier. After this buy she never does waxing. It removes hair completely and works similar as wax. But wax has lots of pulling pain, this doesn't. A one
customer_reviews.author: Hary

customer_reviews.title: better than epilady
customer_reviews.text: Yep, it hurts, but not once you consistently use it because there is far less hair as you go. Worth it. Way better than epilady. Didn't think I would care about built in light but wow is that helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Less noise and works great.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this epilator to replace one I've had for years and is starting to not work as well. My previous one was also the same brand, just a lower model. I didn't need a wet/dry one, I never epilate in the shower anyways. This model is more quiet and works great. I like the light, it helps me see any hairs I may have missed. Certain areas, I'd need to go over it a few times to catch the hair, but it's not a big issue. This model still removes hair quicker than my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Mina Poon

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this thing. I've had mine for a few years, just got this one for my cousin (same exact brand/model). My hairs have thinned out significantly and grow much slower than before. I swear by this thing!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: SO PAINFUL
customer_reviews.text: This product is so incredibly painful, I literally wanted to vomit after a few strokes. It also doesn't really get all the hair and it takes an absolute eternity to do it. It took me an hour to just do one leg from my ankle to my knee. This is the only epilator I have used so it may just be a common complaint, but I would not use this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Marine Contractor

customer_reviews.title: Bad performance
customer_reviews.text: I have no idea why it's high rates. It's tiny, not comfortable, works only on small area which makes you suffer twice and creates a huge possibility to leave area unshaved. The worst part is button, it does not located in right place which is very frustrating to turn it off when you need it, slow down or turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Larisa G. Horback

customer_reviews.title: painful, but worth it
customer_reviews.text: I use it on my armpits only- which I used to spend hours tweezing. It's a bit painful because it pinches skin no matter how hard you try to avoid it, but overall a huge time saver, and not much more painful than tweezing anyways. It's easy to clean and assemble. If I'm ever brave and inebriated, I may try it on my bikini line.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Romero

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my sister as gift since her last one broke. Nice smooth epilate, easy to use and comes with attachments to cut hair to the right length for less pain. She’s loving the epilator. Would buy again if needed
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P

customer_reviews.title: Probably belongs in a medieval dungeon of pain but wife loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I don't personally know how well this thing works because there is no way in hell I'm letting a machine rip hair out of my body! However, that being said, my wife said it works really well, and she likes the fact that it has a light on it so you can see the hair a little better, as she goes about her sadistic ritual of torturing her body with the handheld equivalent of a crop combine.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Lawhon

customer_reviews.title: Quicker and cheaper than wax appointments
customer_reviews.text: 10/10 would recommend. If you want an at home hair removal treatment, this is it. It's painful on my arms, but the bikini area is either numb, or has a looser hold on my hair follicles. It grows back slower and thinner! I can do my whole body in under an hour and I don't have to wait to make an appointment or for my own wax to melt.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: This is awesome.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is quick, quiet and useful. I’ve been epilating for years so I may be used to it but I can barely feel this whisking the hairs off. It’s amazing (particularly compared to the low end thing I had before). The light could be brighter or wider but it is helpful. The switch is slightly tricky, when I try to turn it off it flips tooo far and goes to the other setting, but other than that, get this!
customer_reviews.author: Kato

customer_reviews.title: Great all around epilator
customer_reviews.text: This is my second epilator and it works really well. I want one of the epi 7 or epi 9’s but will only buy one that works while plugged in. Epilating taking some trail and error. So don’t be surprised if you power through the pain and the results are not what you are looking for. You need to make sure your skin is prepped and you sync your hair growth cycles (very similar to waxing) before you start going long periods hair free. Also if you plan to do a Brazilian just be prepared for it to be a intense experience. I managed to do it even while pregnant but it was painful.
customer_reviews.author: Heather R. Everson

customer_reviews.title: Thought I needed an upgrade and purchased it again - highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this little machine from bed/bath and beyond about 10 years ago and been using it every since. for 10 years with not a single issue (I use it about once every 2 weeks). Thought I needed an upgrade and purchased it again - highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: YanaR

customer_reviews.title: You probably don’t need this
customer_reviews.text: Yeah, the other reviews didn’t lie, it hurts a lot. I’m also finding that it doesn’t remove hairs extremely well. I haven’t totally given up, but I’m not impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: First time user of an epilator and choose Silk-epil 5 due to its good reviews and because it was corded. Worked like a charm and worth the slight discomfort. The tweezing of hairs being plucked out of the body by the hundreds is not pleasant but it is bearable and the result was amazing; I will never shave with a razor again. The corded Silk-epil 5 has lots of power and no worries about having to recharge. I highly recommend this model.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Hard to get smooth legs with this
customer_reviews.text: It is so damn painful, I couldn’t use it more than once despite following all the help info online. I could never get it to feel completely smooth. Gave it to a friend who likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Pretty crappy to be honest
customer_reviews.text: I mean it does the job.. for the most part. But my biggest complaint is the fact you have to go over the same hair like 5 times before the epilator will actually pull it out. What should take less than 30 minutes a leg (with my old epilator) took me almost 45 minutes to an hour per leg. Lots of times it'll just break the hair until it's too short to be plucked out.. Pretty irritating.
customer_reviews.author: LJ.FX35

customer_reviews.title: Works very well! Had a cord, which requires being near an outlet
customer_reviews.text: Didn't read thoroughly & was surprised it required a cord. The cord obviously requires I be near an outlet and can be a bit cumbersome. However, it works very well and for the price is buy it again. (The cord explains the lower price)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah G

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price, cheap item
customer_reviews.text: It is loud, slow, feels very light and cheap... and doesn't epil very good. The first use seemed to be fine m, for that price I was ok with it, but now after 5 times using it, it feels like it's already 5 years old and doesn't do its job anymore. 2nd star is for the light, a must have in my opinion, great! I wanted to save some money as we have a little baby, but now I have to spend more, as this item is loosing its quality already after 5 usings and I probably have to get a better and more expensive model very soon.
customer_reviews.author: daitadu

customer_reviews.title: It stopped working after a month & half
customer_reviews.text: It worked ok for a month & half , Basically for the first 2 use then stoped working, so I have a non working product that I’ve paid for, very unhappy
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Good investment.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Is a bit more silent than another Braun epilator i've had and less painful. Also, shaving with it is awesome because it doesn't leave my skin irritated and i don't have to be buying and throwing away lots of safety razors (the plastic ones). I personally liked that this model of Silk-épil does not need to be charged to be used because i did not like the idea of having to wait until it's charged to use it, that's why i wanted this model. Last but not least, i wanna say that i decided to buy a Braun epilator because i`ve had others in the past and they work perfect and last for yeeears!
customer_reviews.author: Paulina G

customer_reviews.title: Everything was not in the package
customer_reviews.text: The cleaning brush was not included in the package which makes me think it is a refurbished item or someone's return. When you order something on Amazon, you expect to get everything pictured with the item. Other than that, I like it and it works great.
customer_reviews.author: J Guy

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I bought a cheaper one and thought it would be okay but you pay for what you get. This one works great the light IS actually useful. Worth the price instead of constantly paying for more wax beads.
customer_reviews.author: olivia carril

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but you do have to make several passes, even going very slowly to get all the hairs. Hurts at first (like being snapped with a rubber band), but that eases up after a minute or two, once your body's endorphins kick in. I paid a fortune for 12 laser hair removal sessions for my underarms, and while it got rid of most of the hair I still have enough stragglers to need to do something else about them. This does the trick and it doesn't hurt any worse than the laser did after the first few sessions when they turn up the levels.
customer_reviews.author: Bannarino

customer_reviews.title: Love the Epli function on this Braun 5280.
customer_reviews.text: Have used Braun Silk Epil for years, not sure what model number my last one was, but it was quite a few years old. I believed it wasn't working as well as it once did. Boy was I correct. This model works very well and though it hurts a bit more, I think it is only because it is doing the job the older one was not. Comes with a few different heads for close shave and a stubble kind of shave. The epli function works great. And like previous Braun's it is easily taken apart for cleaning. Love the Braun product line.
customer_reviews.author: Rosierobins

customer_reviews.title: It's hard to say that I love something that causes so much pain
customer_reviews.text: It's hard to say that I love something that causes so much pain, but this is by far my favorite method of hair removal for my legs. My hair grows really fast, but this keeps it at bay for about 3 weeks.... miracles for me!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie K.

customer_reviews.title: Starts to die after about 6-10 uses.
customer_reviews.text: I loved this until the last week it started to pull out less hairs. Then I tried to use it today and it seemed to die slowly...even though it was plugged in! It works fast and fine when I take the covers used to epilate with but as soon as I put them back on it goes back to slowing down. I would return for replacement but the window expired about 10 days ago...how convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant at first with this not being my first electric shaver. Most of them simply do not work. However, when I received the product it had on the depilatory head and I thought this is not what I ordered, but then I realized it also has a shaving head. This product is amazing both heads work perfectly and it even has a light to make it easier to see what you are shaving.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Alimenti

customer_reviews.title: Good product for first time user.
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews on this before I started to get tips so it wouldn't hurt. It worked fine it wasn't as painful as I thought it was going to be. But immediately after I was done I ran cold water where I had epilated and then I put a generous amount of Australian Gold Freeze sunburn Aloe vera gel on it. That worked great! I had hardly any bumps and it was very cooling.
customer_reviews.author: Buckeye Gal Bridgette

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Wish I'd gotten one of these years ago.
customer_reviews.text: Nice little hair removal gizmo! It's much easier, less time consuming, and wayyyyy less messy than waxing. I bought this model because I didn't need all the extra attachments. Plus, I like this less expensive corded model, too, so I don't have to worry about charging it. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: melange

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace one I had for 10 years. So far so good. As for the confusion about using this on your face, you can just be careful. As long as your skin is tight there will be no pinching. I only use this on my face and nothing else. I don't pluck my upper lip though as it is too sensitive but this works great on my chin. It is not recommended by the manufacturer but who really follows all the rules?
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Keep Looking-Not Recommended
customer_reviews.text: This was to replace prior "perfect" Braun Silk-epil 3 after about 5+ years of use. Braun has taken all the beef out and replaced with plastic, smaller parts and fewer in-package things of use. Seriously, Braun, do you thing the cute little blue muffin cold pack is of any use....duh. The cutting head on this 5 vs old 3 is much smaller, lighter-less strength, etc. Pathetic. (As too often, Braun let the bean counters dictate to engineering and manufacturing. Next.)
customer_reviews.author: Robert Alverson

customer_reviews.title: Convenient but at a cost
customer_reviews.text: I liked the product for that it is easy to use and before a party it could do wonders for you. You can even use it in car offcourse when you are not in the driving seat. What I don't like about it is its cleaning and also it leaves some small hair which becomes difficult to pluck even with a tweser . It also cause small pimples on the face after its use.
customer_reviews.author: Gulrukh Hamd

customer_reviews.title: Rewarding
customer_reviews.text: Painful at first, then much easier the second time and so on. I find it very rewarding to not have to worry about unwanted hair every day. Glad to have a corded device and not worry about battery. Will buy again if/when this one stops working.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last more than 10 uses! Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: It did the work but stopped working a few months after I bought it, I probably used it 10 times and I am now waiting for a response from the manufacturer. It must be a Quality issue.
customer_reviews.author: shilrey

customer_reviews.title: THE RIGHT ONE!
customer_reviews.text: i LOOKED ALL OVER & THEN THOUGHT AMAZON MIGHT HAVE A GOOD ONE! YEP THEY DID & OH BOY AM I EVER GLAD I FOUND THIS ONE. IT REALLY WORKS.. ALL FACIAL HAIR GONE & AND GENTLE TO USE. DON'T MISS THIS ONE LADIES IT'S GREAT! THANKS AMAZON FOR BRINGING US TE VERY BEST1
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: ... I bought for $30 on Amazon did a much better and faster job removing hair
customer_reviews.text: The braun I bought for $30 on Amazon did a much better and faster job removing hair. This one also scratched and scraped my skin. The turn knob on it sucks and and gets in the way. Also, the light is useless due to where it is placed. Poor design and quality. Works but not the best at all.
customer_reviews.author: REREE

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THIS LITTLE MACHINE
customer_reviews.text: This little machine is amazing. I hadn't touched my leg hairs in months (winter time in NYC) and it took me about 20-25 minutes on each leg on the slower speed, which I think is an acceptable amount of time. Yes, it hurts but you get used to it quickly, especially if you're used to waxing, which I am. It was very clean and easy to use. Overall, I very much recommend this product!! I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.author: Lilliana Accorsi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing epilator
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Braun epilators for years and they are absolutely wonderful. They last me many years. The previous one I bought was the same one as this and I’m not sure why it suddenly stopped working but I certainly had it for at least 3-4 years.
customer_reviews.author: Reem K.

customer_reviews.title: Better than going to get waxed
customer_reviews.text: If you hate going to get yourself waxed and showing the world your private parts-this is for you! Yes, it hurts at first, but you get used to it. Don’t really need the extra attachments, but they are there in case you want to use this as a regular razor. Costs as much as one waxing session-totally worth it if you can handle the sting
customer_reviews.author: Take it EZ Nance

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Didn't figure out yet if it is so painless or it just cuts hair. I like it anyway. Mine was super painful and annoying. This one is just a song compared to my old one.
customer_reviews.author: Elena

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A RIPOFF!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!! I purposely picked this particular product because it had a reliable name behind it, so I thought. I bought this epilator on July 4 2019. I have used it a total of 2 times. I just went to use it for the third time and the motor is not moving the rotator shaver. Of course I wanted to send it back but the return policy ended August 4, 2019. How convenient for the manufacturer. What a waste of $70.00! This company should be ashamed of themselves!
customer_reviews.author: robert sheehan

customer_reviews.title: Wore out quickly
customer_reviews.text: There was a learning curve, then I loved it, then it wore out. All in about a year. I'm going to try a different one next.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Its works great. AT first time
customer_reviews.text: I used to be under the impressions that epilators hurts, so never used one. But over the years, razor was hurting and leaving ingrown hair and wearing dresses.skirts was't readily and idea. And my underarms screamed. Did some research, read the reviews and bought Braun silk epli. Its works great. AT first time, took me about an hour to clean my legs using it, however, its getting better everytime. The hair grow is soft and and gentle and no more scars/cuts of the razor. I shave my legs weekly using this product just because I wear dresses everyday and like my legs to be clean and smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Neetu

customer_reviews.title: Best tool
customer_reviews.text: Got my first Epil in the early 90's, this is the only one you will ever need. This is my third one from Braun. I swear by this product, if you have the skills to use under arms it works great. Once your skin adapts to it, you'll have silky skin. I love this product!
customer_reviews.author: NORI

customer_reviews.title: NOT for faces.
customer_reviews.text: It did remove the vellum hair from my face but took the skin off my lip. BUT, it does not state it’s for the face.
customer_reviews.author: john & Debbie

customer_reviews.title: This tiny little torture device works so good. I prefer this corded version verses the battery ...
customer_reviews.text: This tiny little torture device works so good. I prefer this corded version verses the battery that wears out. Been epilating my underarms for years and while it's never pain free, it is MUCH MUCH better than when I started. Totally recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: I had a very basic Remington before that i bought for $25 and it worked perfectly fine for 2 years
customer_reviews.text: My epilator broke after 5 moths of used. I must have used it less than 8 times and it doesnt work anymore. It just does not turn on anymore. I had a very basic Remington before that i bought for $25 and it worked perfectly fine for 2 years.
customer_reviews.author: Celine A.

customer_reviews.title: New to epilating
customer_reviews.text: I bought this on a whim because I was tired of cutting myself shaving. I own a wax pod and wax myself often; I love it but it is tedious and takes a while. My friend mentioned using an epilator a couple years ago and I thought I'd finally try it. I was expecting it to hurt a lot more than it did even on the "efficient" setting. To lessen the pain I pulled my skin taut and it helped a lot. Overall I love this. It's convenient, fast, and easy to clean. 10/10 would recommend :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... have nothing to compare it to but I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I've never had an epilator before this so I have nothing to compare it to but I'm very happy with it! I suggest googling "epilating tips" to help you get started. My legs are so smooth. Yes it hurts at first but the end result is worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Erin R.

customer_reviews.title: Great and almost painless
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement after an earlier épilator started giving trouble within months. Five star for Amazon customer service, otherwise I would have been stuck with a dud piece. It works like a charm, I would say average hair growth. Works very well for fine hair and almost painless. Although I am not brave enough to use it for underarms or thighs, I use veet cold wax strips for that. And I have used it in the 220 V world with an plug (not voltage) adapter. A small package to carry around when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: Frugal shopper

customer_reviews.title: I knew my husband loved his Braun electric shaver so decided to purchase this ...
customer_reviews.text: have had another off brand electric hair remover which really hurt to use. I knew my husband loved his Braun electric shaver so decided to purchase this one. it is truly a wonderful product and so excited to have purchased it. much less discomfort when shaving and leaves legs smooth. have not used the underarm shaver as of yet.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Benson

customer_reviews.title: This works very well on fine hairs. My only complaint is on the thicker
customer_reviews.text: This works very well on fine hairs. My only complaint is on the thicker,coarse hairs it just doesn't pluck as well. It does hurt, the same as tweezers. I don't mind it but I think the bikini area would be a mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: but you'll get used to it and will be satisfied with the results
customer_reviews.text: I will start saying that it really hurts.. but you'll get used to it and will be satisfied with the results. :). I had one that I accidentally broke and I decided to buy the same one from the same brand because it works perfect and is worth the price. Will recommend 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Betta

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok - not built to last though
customer_reviews.text: I bought this epilator a year ago. It’s ok but it doesn’t pull the hair easily in one or two passes. I have to go over the same spot several times. I’m looking at other brands however I wouldn’t purchase another Braun model.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It works great - just as expected. It is a bit painful at first, but you get used to it after multiple uses, and then it's not so bad. I love that it has a cord so I don't have to worry about the battery life lessening over time/the need to replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does so many things!
customer_reviews.text: Love the options this product provides! I can "tweeze" my face and chin, shave my arms, "edge-up" my hairstyle at my neckline and shave my underarms! I couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.author: BubblesCMA

customer_reviews.title: I should have read the review that said it's not ...
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the review that said it's not cordless. I had the Braun SE7681 for years ( I definitely think it's worth the extra money. I had to replace it because I got a chain stuck in it (which my fault). I tried this one out, but having to plug it in each time is a hassle! Other than that it's alright. Does it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy B

customer_reviews.title: Better than Braun SE7929 Silk‐epil 7 Epilator !
customer_reviews.text: I Love it! I used to have Braun SE7929 Silk‐epil 7 Epilator, but it last 20-30 minutes and then I have to charge it and wait to use it again. I have removed all unwanted hair with this one for an hour time. NO waiting just plug it and use it. It also removed the in-grown hair. I am just amazed how easy and fast it is and best thing - I DON'T HAVE TO WAIT FOR IT TO CHARGE!
customer_reviews.author: Teddy

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't have spent my money on this when razors are cheaper
customer_reviews.text: I am not sure what I was expecting, but I have long legs and this takes forever (in my perspective). If you don't want to cut yourself with a razor, this is a good product.I had read reviews before and wasn't impressed. Had hoped for something more precise.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: As Described!
customer_reviews.text: Just as described. Takes some getting use to, but that’s to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Fonville

customer_reviews.title: Beware - it may try to eat you
customer_reviews.text: Works OK but I have 2 big complaints. 1, it only works plugged in. Does not have option to run it on batteries. 2, it occasionally will suck in your skin and it is rather painful and scary.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Harko

product_meta.title: Braun Epilator for Women, Silk-epil 5 5-280 Hair Removal for Women, Bikini Trimmer with 5 extras
product_meta.description:
Style:5280 EpilatorDesigned for uninterrupted hair removal in dry conditions, the Silk-épil 5 Power epilator will never let you down. Braun's specially designed Close-Grip 40 Tweezer epilation technology catches hair as small as a grain of sand (0.5mm), so you'll never have to wait for your body hair to grow so wax can catch it. No more in-between days, no more hassle. Features on or off switch with 12 volt adapter and cord set automatically adapts to any worldwide ac voltage. Note-as hair does not always grow in the same direction, guide the appliance slightly diagonally or in different directions in order to achieve results. The SoftLift Tips effectively lift even flat-lying hair and help guide them to the tweezers for removal.

BRAND STORY
By
feature_bullets: Non-stop power epilator for non-stop smooth skin. Power source: Corded(12V adapter)
40 Close-Grip tweezers remove even the shortest hairs for up to 4 weeks of smooth skin
Massage rollers and a cooling glove help make epilation more comfortable. Virtually painless hair removal with regular use.
Extras: shaver head and trimmer cap for depilation, efficiency cap,and a cooling glove
The device is fully washable under running water for better hygiene. Ergonomic angle - enables convenient use on legs and body

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
